009package Ch03_PointOperations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014
015/**
016 * <p>
017 * This ImageJ plugin increases the contrast of the selected
018 * grayscale image by 50%. The image is modified.
019 * See Sec. 3.1.1 (Prog. 3.1) of [1] for additional details.
020 * </p>
021 * <p>
022 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing - An Algorithmic Approach</em>,
023 * 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
024 * </p>
025 * 
026 * @author WB
027 *
028 */
029public class Raise_Contrast implements PlugInFilter {
030        
031        /** Contrast scale factor. */
032        public static double S = 1.5;
033
034        @Override
035        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
036                return DOES_8G;
037        }
038    
039        @Override
040        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
041                int w = ip.getWidth();
042                int h = ip.getHeight();
043
044                for (int v = 0; v < h; v++) {
045                        for (int u = 0; u < w; u++) {
046                                int a = ip.get(u, v);
047                                int b = (int) (a * 1.5 + 0.5);  // safe form of rounding since a >= 0
048                                if (b > 255)
049                                        b = 255;                                        // clamp to the maximum value
050                                ip.set(u, v, b);
051                        }
052                }
053        }
054        
055}
